name: daily-race-importer
description: Daily race data import function for RaceDay application

scripts.deploy: npm run build && cp dist/* functions/daily-race-importer/src/ && appwrite push functions
scripts.deploy:bulk: npm run build && cp dist/* functions/daily-race-importer/src/ && echo 'daily-race-importer' | appwrite push functions
scripts.deploy:this: npm run build && cp dist/* functions/daily-race-importer/src/ && appwrite functions create-deployment --function-id 687c8695002e32d4272b --code ./functions/daily-race-importer --activate true --entrypoint src/main.js
scripts.execute: appwrite functions list && echo 'Enter function ID to execute:' && read FUNC_ID && appwrite functions create-execution --function-id $FUNC_ID
